author: jboynes
msg: use getMethod to locate method to invoke rather than iterating over all

author: jacopoc
msg: Added support for facility groups in MRP: if a facility group is specified (instead of a facility id) the MRP will use the facilities in the group as warehouse facility (WAREHOUSE) and manufacturing facility (PLANT).

msg: Update master distribution directory with result of phoenix distribution build.
